title: Loot rerolls not working
body: Bought $20 rp to get 10 chests to do some rerolls for new omega squad skins, each time got skin permanents I already owned.

replies.body: Oh, bro, I got the same problem, I used to reroll my skin shards into those new released skins as I owned all skins available for crafting in the Loot. However, it seems like didn't work at those Omega Elite skins, I guess Riot may just cancelled the mechanism for loot rerolling. If the thing is true, I will not top up any RP at all.

Hey dude, sorry about this. The skins were not properly added to the Loot system, this has now been fixed.
If you [raise a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with support, they should be able to reverse the re-rolls for you given that this was a fault on our end.
Great thanks for the help mate
yeah it's weird works fine for any other skin that has come out, guess i just wasted 20 bucks :( https://prnt.sc/g19ad0
Hi Ketz, Thanks for reporting this, I believe I know the cause. I am looking into a resolution for you guys.
thanks man, will we get the shards/rp back?
Support should be able to help you out with that, so I would wait for a response on your ticket.
